channel.title: Vote4cash help

item.title: Vote4cash help
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:372: illegal start of expression
public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:372: ‘;’ expected
public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:372: ‘;’ expected
public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) {
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:377: ‘;’ expected
String results = reader.readLine()
^
4 errors

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

iam trying to follow this https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476829.0.html
tutorial and all i get are theae errors

Any ideas

my script

public void initialize() { public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) { try { String urlString = "http://banditpkz.com/vote.php?type=checkvote&username="+playerName; urlString = urlString.replaceAll(" ", "%20"); BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream())); String results = reader.readLine() if(results.length() > 0) { if(results.equals("user needs reward...")) return true; else return false; } } catch (MalformedURLException e) { System.out.println("Malformed URL Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("IO Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } return false; }

Read full topic
